question: According to its nutritional info, a bag of breads has 375 calories per serving. If a 300 grams bag has 5 servings, how many gramss can you eat if your daily calorie target is 2250 and you have already consumed 1125 calories?
answer:
If the total calorie target is 2250 and I have consumed 1125 calories then I have 2250-1125 = <<2250-1125=1125>>1125 calories left to eat
If each serving of breads has 375 calories and I only have 1125 calories left to eat, then I can only eat 1125/375 of a serving = 3 of a serving
We also know that a 300 grams bag of breads has 5 servings, hence each serving has 300 grams/5 = <<300/5=60>>60 gramss
If I can only eat 3 of a serving, then I can eat only 60 grams * 3 = 180 gramss
#### 180
